text: Genaro Anthony "Tony" Sirico, Jr. (July 29, 1942 â€“ July 8, 2022) was an American actor. He was known for his role as the mobster Paulie "Walnuts" Gualtieri in the television series The Sopranos and Tony Stacks in the Martin Scorsese movie Goodfellas. He also provided the voice of Vinny Griffin on the sitcom Family Guy. Sirico died on July 8, 2022 in Fort Lauderdale, Florida from problems caused by dementia at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Deaths from dementia
title: Tony Sirico
